result.title: How can i solve SPOJ BRACKETS question?http://www.spoj.com/problems/BRCKTS/
result.content: I know we can solve it using segment tree but i am not unable to proceed. There are two things we need to solve this question are that the sum should be zero (if we consider '(' as 1 and ')' as -1) and i am not able to figure out the other thing? Can you please tell the second point which is important and explain it as well?
